name: spielend-programmieren
tag_list: programming, game, learning, python, pygame, qcake, software, open-source, linux, ubuntu, vienna, austria, kids, teens, programming-courses, teaching, school, 3d, 2d, game-programming
overview:
Horst JENS offers open source game programming courses to students in Vienna, Austria. Focus on teaching game programming with open source tools and languages like Linux, Python, Pygame, Qcake and more.

spielend-programmieren is german language for “programming while playing”
